charges.charge_description: 21:841(a) Possession with the Intent to Distribute a Controlled Substance (methamphetamine)(1)

charges.charge_disposition: custody for 75 months (15 months on count 1 and 60 months on count 2, both to be served consecutively), 5 yrs supervised release, with conditions, $200 special assessment

charges.charge_description: 18:924(c)(1)(A)(I) Possession of a Firearm in Furtherance of Drug Trafficking(2)

charges.charge_disposition: custody for 75 months (15 months on count 1 and 60 months on count 2, both to be served consecutively), 5 yrs supervised release, with conditions, $200 special assessment

charges.charge_description: 18:922(g)- Knowingly and intentionelly possess in or affecting commerce, a firearm that has been shipped or transported in interstate of foreign commerce, after having been convicted in a court of a crime punishable by imprisonment for a term exceeding one year.

charges.charge_disposition: custody for 78 months (18 months on count 1 and 60 months on count 2, both to be served consecutively), 5 yrs supervised release, with conditions, $200 special assessment
